decisions.name: Evaluate_What_Application_Record_Type_to_Assign
decisions.label: Evaluate What Application Record Type to Assign

fields.name: Confirm_Application_Type_Land_Use_Display
fields.fieldText:
Confirm Application Type

Confirm the selected application type is correct before proceeding forward. If not, click Previous to go back and select a different application type.


Application Name: {!Selected_Application_Template.Name}

Application Description: {!Selected_Application_Template.MUSW__Description__c}


﻿If this application is related to an existing project, search for the Project Number.

fields.name: Confirm_Application_Type_Land_Use_Display_2
fields.fieldText:
Confirm Application Type

Confirm the selected application type is correct before proceeding forward. If not, click Previous to go back and select a different application type.


All New Development and New Major Subdivision Applications must have a completed Pre-Application Meeting. If you have completed that activity, search for the Application Number.


Application Name: {!Selected_Application_Template.Name}

Application Description: {!Selected_Application_Template.MUSW__Description__c}

fields.name: Confirm_Application_Type_Land_Use_Display_3

fields.name: Confirm_Application_Type_Land_Use_Footer
fields.fieldText: To stop your application and continue at a later date, click Pause.

fields.name: Confirm_Application_Type_Permit_Display
fields.fieldText:
Confirm Application Type

Confirm the selected application type is correct before proceeding forward. If not, click Previous to go back and select a different application type. if the application type is correct, enter the required information below before proceeding.


Application Name: {!Selected_Application_Template.Name}

Application Description: {!Application_Template_Description}


﻿If this application is related to an existing project, search for the Project Number.

fields.name: Confirm_Application_Type_Permit_Footer
fields.fieldText: To stop your application and continue at a later date, click Pause.

fields.name: Error_Screen_Display
fields.fieldText:
Something went wrong


Click previous to go back and try again. If the issue persists, pause your work and contact us at cityofclariti@email.com. Include any error messages you see below.


{!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: Select_Application_Template_Record_Type_Display
fields.fieldText: To get started, select what category of application you like to apply for. To learn more about what you can apply for online, see {PAGE}. After selecting, you'll be able to further refine what type of application you want to submit.

fields.name: Select_Application_Type_Dispay
fields.fieldText:
Select Application Type

To get started, select what type of application you would like to apply for by using the options below. To learn more about what you can apply for online, see {PAGE}.

fields.name: Select_Application_Type_Footer
fields.fieldText: To stop your application and continue at a later date, click Pause.
